### Useful Base R commands


#### Text

* <tt> grep()</tt>
* <tt> gsub()</tt>
* <tt> nchar()</tt>
* <tt> paste()</tt>
* <tt> readLines() </tt> and <tt>writeLines()</tt>
* <tt> matrix() </tt>

#### Dates

* <tt> Sys.Date()</tt>
* <tt> as.Date()</tt>
